Kirishima, looking at his phone: Nothing.
Bakugou, grabbing his phone: YOU BETTER NOT BE LOOKING...

Bakugou: What are you doing?
Kirishima, looking at his phone: Nothing.
Bakugou, grabbing his phone: YOU BETTER NOT BE LOOKING FOR POKEMON WHEN WE'RE IN THE MIDDLE OF A MISSION!

blog.name: aquanutart
blog.title: aquanutart
blog.description:
Commission Info
Commissions are OPEN.

This is a casual art blog. I draw a lot of pictures of videogames and sometimes animation that I like and occasionally various other things as I feel like it. I like to draw cute things.

Requests are closed. Please do NOT use or edit my art, including for icons or avatars, thank you!

main art tag

zelda / fire emblem / pokemon / animal crossing / ff7 / ff13 / steven universe / inazuma eleven / disney / pixar / portal / neopets / gravity falls / gekkan shoujo nozaki kun / mawaru penguindrum

summary: B for Toshinori on the Valentines Day post? 💗
question: B for Toshinori on the Valentines Day post? 💗
answer: It was the fact you saw him for him even when he showed you his true form. The form he never liked about himself, it made him realize just how much he loved you.

tags: didn't really know which it would fit under so i settled for both
summary: AU where Izuku doesn't aim to become a pro hero but instead goes on to become a talk show host where all the guests are members...
body:
AU where Izuku doesn’t aim to become a pro hero but instead goes on to become a talk show host where all the guests are members of the hero industry. Whereas any typical host would be used to seeing major motivational figures so often, Izuku is beyond flabbergasted every single time, even if he’s had a particular hero on the show before. Whether he even knows who he’s being set up to interview or not, the moment they walk on stage he’s positively shaking in his seat as a smile breaks onto his face unrestrained. Edgeshot comes on one night and he starts screaming and cheering with the crowd as he fails to know what to do with himself in his excitement. All Might (likely retired here) eventually steps on stage on one show and Izuku just about faints in his seat.

This also means he meets every single member of the infamous Class 3A, who’ve now all gone on to become top heroes in Japan. He consequently becomes friends with almost all of them, helping them overcome habits that maybe hadn’t been noticed or just simply hadn’t been broken throughout their intense hero training in high school and beyond. Over time, Izuku shows Shouto that heroes aren’t necessarily defined by the power they are born with and have the ability to shape themselves as they want to become. He inspires Ingenium (Tenya) to begin a foundation entirely dedicated to helping retired pro heroes to learn to live with or overcome the lasting factors that came with putting their life on the line, including PTSD, debilitating injuries, etc.

Further down the line, they go as far as to say that Izuku is their hero. He cries and they all share a hug.

One thing that every guest can agree on is that this is probably one of their favourite interviews to have ever had the pleasure of participating in. Izuku is overwhelmingly endearing, and unlike any other television host, he so obviously loves what he does and admires the people he meets. At this point, no one knows if they’re watching the show for Izuku’s charm or for the heroes anymore.

www.patreon.com/mileydragneel


Commissions open!


-This drawing had already uploaded my Patron a long time ago, now I publish it here XD
I think it’s one of the few couples that I like about BnH (since I’m not much of a shipping in this serie), although there have not been romantic moments between them, I feel they stick with their style both XD
I also love Jiro, so XD

Espero les guste n.n

summary: Kirishima’s (gender neutral, pls) crush has really cold hands and so Kiri’s like “hey ur hands r cold” and holds their hand to...
question: Kirishima’s (gender neutral, pls) crush has really cold hands and so Kiri’s like “hey ur hands r cold” and holds their hand to warm them up??? and just??? cuTE?????
answer:
AwwwWWW, I really liked this ask its so cute and it made my heart flutter. My skin is clear. Hope you like this. It’s rather short tho
~Admin Bomb

Every time Kirishima would feel s/o’s hands, whether it be during training or handing them a pencil, they were cold. He almost didn’t want to touch them, the feeling of the cold contrasting greatly with his body heat would send shivers down his body

He noticed that today they were especially bad in particular, the middle of winter nearing was making the weather extra cold, your hands feeling like ice to his hands

And it seemed like you didn’t notice it. Because you didn’t

Your mother would always say you had cold hands, even from a little baby your hands would have been the coldest hands she had ever felt on a human. No less a baby. It wasn’t like there was anything wrong medically, you just naturally had cold hands. (Most likely from one of your parents having some cold related quirk)

And you learned to live with it. Of course, goosebumps would work their way across your body every time you felt them on some of the warmer parts of your body, but it didn’t surprise you anymore

You knew people were surprised, especially Kirishima, at your cold hands. But it warmed your heart that he worried

During your study session, you could feel your own cold hands leaving marks on the paper, and Kirishima could feel it too, radiating off your fingers when he reached over them to point something out

He was hesitant on his questions. Not really knowing how to ask this without it sounding weird. But it made his cheeks flush. This wasn’t manly at all! He can’t just ask to hold his crush’s hand? Damn

This could take him till the end of the session to even have the courage to ask. But he didn’t want that! He’d love to hold his crushes hand

He took a deep breath. Writing down a problem he spent a little while on, he eyed s/o’s hands. They looked perfect for him. But they were so cold! Wait a second

“Hey, s/o?” Kirishima voiced, putting down his pencil. His confidence boosted

“Yeah? What is it Kiri?” They looked up, seeing his snaggletooth hang out his mouth with a smile. Holy shit that was cute. How can someone, who rants about manliness, be so fucking cute 24/7??? And with a snaggle tooth??? What???

“Can I warm up your hands?”

“H-Huh?” They cursed themself for stuttering

“I noticed your hands were cold, like a lot colder than usual. So I wanted to warm them up. I work out a lot, so it makes my body heat a little warmer.” He reached out, grabbing your hands and sandwiching them with his

Every nerve in Kirishima’s body told him to ABORT MISSION but his body didn’t listen, feeling the ice hands s/o had, but he could also feel the hands they sport underneath their temperature. They felt nice in his hands. Smaller than his hands, but still nice

A pale pink pasted across s/o’s face, the feelings of his hands were rough. Most likely from training. But they sent butterflies fluttering in their stomach, and they began holding his hand back, no longer laying limp in his

Neither of them wanted to let go for the rest of the night What if they could just stay here forever? Holding each other’s hands? It’d be bliss

But when parents call you home, you have to go

“Alright. I’m almost ready for this stupid cold weather.” S/o bent down, typing their shoes

Kirishima watched their hands move, gentle for their cold nature tying their winter boots on. He didn’t want them to go. Would a hug be too much?

Once they were done, he reached his arms out for a hug. S/o didn’t hesitate to jump into his arms, hugging the giant shark boy tightly, missing the touch of his hands against theirs, and just missing him. Even though they haven’t even left the door yet

“Hey S/o?”

“Yeah Kiri?”

“Can I hold your hands again tomorrow?”

They smiled, snuggling into his hoodie. “Yeah. I’d like that.” And with that, they left out the door, a smile on both their faces

~Admin Bomb

AwwwWWW, I really liked this ask its so cute and it made my heart flutter. My skin is clear. Hope you like this. It’s rather short tho
~Admin Bomb

Every time Kirishima would feel s/o’s hands, whether it be during training or handing them a pencil, they were cold. He almost didn’t want to touch them, the feeling of the cold contrasting greatly with his body heat would send shivers down his body

He noticed that today they were especially bad in particular, the middle of winter nearing was making the weather extra cold, your hands feeling like ice to his hands

And it seemed like you didn’t notice it. Because you didn’t

Your mother would always say you had cold hands, even from a little baby your hands would have been the coldest hands she had ever felt on a human. No less a baby. It wasn’t like there was anything wrong medically, you just naturally had cold hands. (Most likely from one of your parents having some cold related quirk)

And you learned to live with it. Of course, goosebumps would work their way across your body every time you felt them on some of the warmer parts of your body, but it didn’t surprise you anymore

You knew people were surprised, especially Kirishima, at your cold hands. But it warmed your heart that he worried

During your study session, you could feel your own cold hands leaving marks on the paper, and Kirishima could feel it too, radiating off your fingers when he reached over them to point something out

He was hesitant on his questions. Not really knowing how to ask this without it sounding weird. But it made his cheeks flush. This wasn’t manly at all! He can’t just ask to hold his crush’s hand? Damn

This could take him till the end of the session to even have the courage to ask. But he didn’t want that! He’d love to hold his crushes hand

He took a deep breath. Writing down a problem he spent a little while on, he eyed s/o’s hands. They looked perfect for him. But they were so cold! Wait a second

“Hey, s/o?” Kirishima voiced, putting down his pencil. His confidence boosted

“Yeah? What is it Kiri?” They looked up, seeing his snaggletooth hang out his mouth with a smile. Holy shit that was cute. How can someone, who rants about manliness, be so fucking cute 24/7??? And with a snaggle tooth??? What???

“Can I warm up your hands?”

“H-Huh?” They cursed themself for stuttering

“I noticed your hands were cold, like a lot colder than usual. So I wanted to warm them up. I work out a lot, so it makes my body heat a little warmer.” He reached out, grabbing your hands and sandwiching them with his

Every nerve in Kirishima’s body told him to ABORT MISSION but his body didn’t listen, feeling the ice hands s/o had, but he could also feel the hands they sport underneath their temperature. They felt nice in his hands. Smaller than his hands, but still nice

A pale pink pasted across s/o’s face, the feelings of his hands were rough. Most likely from training. But they sent butterflies fluttering in their stomach, and they began holding his hand back, no longer laying limp in his

Neither of them wanted to let go for the rest of the night What if they could just stay here forever? Holding each other’s hands? It’d be bliss

But when parents call you home, you have to go

“Alright. I’m almost ready for this stupid cold weather.” S/o bent down, typing their shoes

Kirishima watched their hands move, gentle for their cold nature tying their winter boots on. He didn’t want them to go. Would a hug be too much?

Once they were done, he reached his arms out for a hug. S/o didn’t hesitate to jump into his arms, hugging the giant shark boy tightly, missing the touch of his hands against theirs, and just missing him. Even though they haven’t even left the door yet

“Hey S/o?”

“Yeah Kiri?”

“Can I hold your hands again tomorrow?”

They smiled, snuggling into his hoodie. “Yeah. I’d like that.” And with that, they left out the door, a smile on both their faces

blog.name: twice-the-twice-love
blog.title: Twice is #1 Ally
blog.description: This is my MHA side blog and love for twice daily. Every day the same image of twice posted twice here. It's gotta be posted twice. Let me ramble about how I love the LoV and Precepts and Everyone basically (We all know the exceptions)Ask box is open to answer questions imagines HCs with people.

summary: Favourite thing I have done in an OC universe
body:
Favourite thing I have done in an OC universe

Is with @chonzu give twice a set of twins named Angel and Menace. They switch Jins a lot until they meet LoV Jin.

I love to think Jin would so try to bring them too the League meetings and have the 10 year olds just going around quoting children of the corn and the shining.

Kurogiri behind the bar starring at the kids giggling saying “Redrum!” over and over. Until someone gets the joke. That or because they all have bright blond hair they do creepy talking in sync twin things.

The kids looking at Shigaraki, “Come play with us Shiggy!”

Shigaraki, “Fuck off twice spawns!”

summary: Boku No Hero Academia Mochi Mochi Tsum Vol. 2 Box Split
title: Boku No Hero Academia Mochi Mochi Tsum Vol. 2 Box Split
body:
They are $7.50 each shipping included.They are pre-orders. If you’re interested just message me. ^-^

Still available: Bakugou, Ochako, Kaminari

Taken: Kirishima, Jiro, Mina, Mei, Deku, Todoroki, Aziawa
